title: Player expenses ( payroll ) of LA Galaxy ( MLS ) 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars for 30 number of Months.
The Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic and lowest at Month Diedie Traore.
There is a difference of 7143.75 between the maximum Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic and minimum Month Diedie Traore.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars for 30 number of Months.
The Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars is highest at Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic and lowest at Month Diedie Traore.
The second highest Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Month Jonathan dos Santos.
There is a difference of 7143.75 between the maximum Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic and minimum Month Diedie Traore.
The Month Zlatan Ibrahimovic has the highest Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars, followed by Jonathan dos Santos, and Romain Alessandrini. Down to the Month Diedie Traore which is the lowest.
Overall Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars has decreased over the Months.
Month Emil Cuello, Matt Lampson, and Servando Carrasco have a similar Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars that is 70.25.
The Month Diedie Traore has 11.62 times less Payroll in thousand U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 18591.67.
